Key Match Events: Sanju Samson hit the second-fastest T20I century by an Indian off 40 balls
Suryakumar Yadav hit a six off left-arm speedster Mustafizur Rahman
Riyan Parag hit four sixes in his innings
Hardik Pandya hit four sixes in his innings
Mayank Yadav dismissed Parvez Hossain Emon with the first ball of the Bangladesh reply
Ravi Bishnoi picked up three wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Sanju Samson expressed satisfaction with his performance
The team highlighted the importance of their batting partnership
Miscellaneous Highlights: India scored 297, its highest in T20Is
The match took place at the Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium in Hyderabad
